article_title: John Kitzhaber Will Still Cost Taxpayers Millions

article_metadata.author: EconoSTATS

og.description: By Jeremy Lott This week brought news that Oregon taxpayers are on the hook for $35,000, per person, in legal fees for a clown car packed to the wheel-wells with Democratic politicians and consultants. The newly subsidized include disgraced ex-governor John Kitzhaber, forced to step down last month. Also covered under that [...]
og.title: Oregon's Long Statewide Nightmare Isn't Over: John Kitzhaber Will Still Cost Taxpayers Millions
